system.description:
This small silver charm resembles a feather. Many types of feather tokens exist with different effects.

You can use an action to toss the token onto a body of water at least 60 feet in diameter. The token transforms into a 50-foot long, 20-foot wide boat.

The boat needs no propulsion and moves at a speed of 6 miles per hour, requiring no skill to operate. You can use an action to direct the boat to turn up to 90 degrees.

Up to 32 medium creatures and their equipment can travel comfortably on the boat (Large creatures count as 4 creatures and Huge creatures count as 8 creatures).

The boat remains for up to 24 hours before disappearing. You may spend an action to dismiss the boat.
